channel.title: _am1t tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from _am1t.

item.description: I am not a horror movie fan. I have seen a few over the years but do not enjoy them. With age, my patience with them has further gone down. I do not watch this genre at all anymore. Or so I thought. I was recently reminded of my dislike as I read this ... https://t.co/oZnRyLOL4z
item.source:markdown: I am not a horror movie fan. I have seen a few over the years but do not enjoy them. With age, my patience with them has further gone down. I do not watch this genre at all anymore. Or so I thought. I was recently reminded of my dislike as I read this ... https://t.co/oZnRyLOL4z

item.description: I watched The Gray Man today – mindless action is not entertainment to me. I had fun when it was in superhero films. It doesn’t here.
item.source:markdown: I watched The Gray Man today – mindless action is not entertainment to me. I had fun when it was in superhero films. It doesn’t here.

item.description: I find it surprising that iTunes remain the only good store to buy digital music even today. There has to be some reason that all the big players have exited the space and have gone the streaming route. Is it the competition? Or the overall logistics of selling digital music?
item.source:markdown: I find it surprising that iTunes remain the only good store to buy digital music even today. There has to be some reason that all the big players have exited the space and have gone the streaming route. Is it the competition? Or the overall logistics of selling digital music?

item.description: I watched The Batman today – I am glad that after a few terrible few showings, we have a good setting again. It’s not a perfect movie – it’s too long and too thin. But I loved the way it’s shot, it does “look and sound brilliant”. The first half is ... https://t.co/a1d2FuTRFS
item.source:markdown: I watched The Batman today – I am glad that after a few terrible few showings, we have a good setting again. It’s not a perfect movie – it’s too long and too thin. But I loved the way it’s shot, it does “look and sound brilliant”. The first half is ... https://t.co/a1d2FuTRFS

item.description: "We need a way to stand still in shock as long it takes when change and tragedy come in, when our lives are upended" -- So well said by Annie Mueller. https://t.co/5p9L5bXWyo
item.source:markdown: "We need a way to stand still in shock as long it takes when change and tragedy come in, when our lives are upended" -- So well said by Annie Mueller. https://t.co/5p9L5bXWyo

item.description: @stillwrinkled Good. Not the case on all flights. Many others are taking this to the other extreme.
item.source:markdown: @stillwrinkled Good. Not the case on all flights. Many others are taking this to the other extreme.

item.description: It was 10 years ago today that I began a seven-day challenge not to log in to Facebook. I haven’t seen that timeline since then. It was a good, eye-opening challenge in that sense. Nice!
item.source:markdown: It was 10 years ago today that I began a seven-day challenge not to log in to Facebook. I haven’t seen that timeline since then. It was a good, eye-opening challenge in that sense. Nice!

item.description:
We sometimes write sentences that don’t need to exist. Hidden in a paragraph, we might not notice. Standing on their own, we notice. Delete any sentence not worthy of its own line.

Source: Writing one sentence per line | Derek Sivers → https://t.co/VUQ1tUFGVX
item.source:markdown:
We sometimes write sentences that don’t need to exist. Hidden in a paragraph, we might not notice. Standing on their own, we notice. Delete any sentence not worthy of its own line.
Source: Writing one sentence per line | Derek Sivers → https://t.co/VUQ1tUFGVX
